name: Halo: Combat Evolved
notes: Requires product key. Official No-CD patch installed automatically.

insert-disc.message: Mount the Halo Combat Evolved CD to continue

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Running setup. Use Express install, and close when it asks if you want to launch.

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing No-CD official patch from drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Halo/haloupdate.exe

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Halo/halo.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    message: Mount the Halo Combat Evolved CD to continue
    requires: Setup.Exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msxml3
    description: Installing msxml3
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    description: Installing dotnet35sp1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    description: Installing dotnet40
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    description: Installing dotnet4.5.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vb6run
    description: Installing vb6run
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mfc42
    description: Installing mfc42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    description: Installing d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    description: Windows7 check
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running setup. Use Express install, and close when it asks if you
      want to launch.
    executable: $DISC/Setup.Exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing No-CD official patch from drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft
      Games/Halo/haloupdate.exe
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Halo/haloupdate.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
